authors.bio:
I am pursuing Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science & Engineering at Institute of Technology, Nirma University. I will be joining Goldman Sachs Engineering Division at Bengaluru as a Summer Analyst.
I love Machine Learning and Deep Learning.
